surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: She has a fan made of thin bamboo strips, which is extremely delicate.

sentences.english: The baby's dress was beautifully tucked with tiny stitches.

sentences.english: She could barely believe that such a dumb man as he was would be so considerate and thoughtful.

sentences.english: Carbon fiber consists of thin strands of carbon woven into a yarn that in turn can be made into cloth.
